model

Class Car

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Car
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent

    public class Car
extends java.lang.Object
implements Agent
    A car remembers its position from the beginning of its road. Cars have random carVelocity and random movement pattern.
